医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现胆囊癌患者的生存率没有因肝脏切除面积的不同而存在差异胆囊癌最常见于患有胆结石或过去患有胆结石的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Study-finds-no-difference-in-survival-rate-for-gallbladder-cancer-患者-based-on-liver-resection-size.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Study-finds-no-difference-in-survival-rate-for-gallbladder-cancer-患者-based-on-liver-resection-size.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c9ea692-82e0-4b4f-89e0-985b24dea196 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 12:10:24 -0400 Study finds no difference in survival rate for gallbladder cancer patients based on liver resection size
益生菌可能有助于预防衰老过程中的认知能力下降一项新研究的结果表明，服用益生菌有助于预防伴随衰老而出现的记忆力和思维能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Probiotic-may-help-prevent-cognitive-decline-during-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Probiotic-may-help-prevent-cognitive-decline-during-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40e57a57-8651-4698-a7c2-e271b7e9bd74 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 12:00:12 -0400 Probiotic may help prevent cognitive decline during aging
儿童时期看电视的时间较长与成年代谢综合征的风险较高有关奥塔哥大学的一项研究进一步证明，儿童时期看太多电视会导致成年后健康状况不佳。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Longer-television-viewing-times-in-childhood-linked-to-higher-risk-of-adulthood-metabolic-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Longer-television-viewing-times-in-childhood-linked-to-higher-risk-of-adulthood-metabolic-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc3cef7c-6a09-4feb-8333-d68b96f774b1 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 11:11:06 -0400 Longer television viewing times in childhood linked to higher risk of adulthood metabolic syndrome
养成8个健康习惯可以延长人的寿命数十年一项涉及超过 700,000 名美国退伍军人的新研究报告称，在中年时养成八种健康生活习惯的人比那些很少或没有这些习惯的人预期寿命要长得多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Adopting-8-healthy-habits-could-add-decades-to-a-persons-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Adopting-8-healthy-habits-could-add-decades-to-a-persons-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bfe1cdc-fe4c-4e0b-9705-288ae6e4b751 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 11:04:08 -0400 Adopting 8 healthy habits could add decades to a person's life
新的基于人工智能的系统旨在促进中风患者的康复过程统计数据表明，全球 25 岁以上成年人中，有四分之一的人一生中会患过中风。这种疾病最严重的后果之一是残疾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-AI-based-system-aims-to-facilitate-the-rehabilitation-process-for-中风-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-AI-based-system-aims-to-facilitate-the-rehabilitation-process-for-中风-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6adcb33-7a71-4c5e-abc7-9f20cbf7ec8f Mon, 24 Jul 2023 10:57:59 -0400 New AI-based system aims to facilitate the rehabilitation process for stroke patients
新技术可以使前列腺癌患者的放射治疗更加安全一种以成像技术为指导的技术可以帮助临床医生将放射束准确地瞄准前列腺，同时避开膀胱、尿道和直肠中的附近组织，从而使前列腺癌患者的放射治疗更加安全。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-technique-can-make-radiation-therapy-safer-for-病人-with-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-technique-can-make-radiation-therapy-safer-for-病人-with-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5caf0a89-f0ce-4cbd-aba9-d36392dc45f9 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 10:54:57 -0400 New technique can make radiation therapy safer for patients with prostate cancer
乳酸在帮助神经干细胞发育成专门的神经元方面发挥着关键作用东北大学的科学家发现乳酸在帮助神经干细胞发育成特殊神经元（这一过程被称为神经元分化）方面发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Lactate-plays-a-ritic-role-in-in-helping-neural-stem-cells-develop-into-specialized-neurons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Lactate-plays-a-ritic-role-in-in-helping-neural-stem-cells-develop-into-specialized-neurons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bee9a1b4-994b-4caa-a58b-a1f3e3349db0 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 10:05:00 -0400 Lactate plays a critical role in helping neural stem cells develop into specialized neurons
COVID-19 对结直肠癌筛查和结果的影响2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 大流行对结直肠癌筛查的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Modeling-the-impact-of-COVID-19-on-colorectal-cancer-screening-and-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Modeling-the-impact-of-COVID-19-on-colorectal-cancer-screening-and-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5612da88-70ec-44ce-842b-92eb14569ad6 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 09:44:00 -0400 The impact of COVID-19 on colorectal cancer screening and outcomes
限时饮食可能是 2 型糖尿病患者减肥的一个很好的选择减肥通常是 2 型糖尿病患者的目标，2 型糖尿病患者与超重或肥胖密切相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Time-restricted-eating-can-be-a-good-alternative-for-weight-loss-in-people-with-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Time-restricted-eating-can-be-a-good-alternative-for-weight-loss-in-people-with-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e87389a4-2879-4982-a6f7-515ee523e169 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 09:34:14 -0400 Time-restricted eating can be a good alternative for weight loss in people with type 2 diabetes
膳食 omega-3 脂肪酸可预防与年龄相关的听力损失研究人员报告说，在一项新的基于人群的横断面研究中，Omega-3 脂肪酸二十二碳六烯酸 (DHA) 的血液水平与听力困难呈负相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Dietary-omega-3-fatty-acids-may-protect-against-age-lated-hearing-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Dietary-omega-3-fatty-acids-may-protect-against-age-lated-hearing-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca68d088-5c12-4fe5-a33a-07e3fe7dac20 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 09:30:44 -0400 Dietary omega-3 fatty acids may protect against age-related hearing loss
